accessibility.summary: Allow you to modify how an element interacts with assistive technologies.

alignment.summary: Allow you to modify how text is aligned in a page section.

background-color.summary: Allow you to modify the background color of an element.

box-shadow.summary: Allow you to apply shadows to an element.

display.summary: Allow you to modify how an element is displayed in a page section.

flex.summary: Allow you to modify the layout and alignment of elements in a page section.

float.summary: Allow you to float elements inside of a page section.

sizing.summary: Allow you to modify the width and height of elements in a page section.

spacing.summary: Allow you to modify the spacing of elements in a page section.

text.summary: Allow you to modify the styling of text elements.
